title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 401.8 - Advertising
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 401.8 - Advertising

State Regulations

Every licensee shall maintain samples of all advertising
material used by it (including commercial script of all radio broadcasts) for a
period of two years from the date of its use and shall inform the
superintendent of the licensed location at which such materials are kept. Such
samples shall be available for inspection at any time by a representative of
the Banking Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
401.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
